damage_formula.strong_poison: 5% of target MAX HP per turn
damage_formula.weak_poison: 2.5% of target MAX HP per turn
damage_formula.description: Poison deals percentage damage of target's MAX HP at the START of target's turn (before target takes actions). NOT affected by target's DEF, Increase/Decrease DEF buffs, or Weaken. Fixed percentage damage.
damage_formula.notes: Poison is MAX HP damage, meaning higher boss HP = higher Poison damage. Bosses limits to poison damage s limited. Check boss info for HP values and max damage.

stacking_mechanics.poison_stacking: Poison stacks up to debuff limit (max 10 Poisons on target)
stacking_mechanics.theoretical_max: 10 strong Poisons × 5% = 50% MAX HP per turn
stacking_mechanics.notes: Poison is ONLY debuff that stacks (same debuff type can have multiple instances). HP Burn, Decrease DEF, etc. do NOT stack.

proc_mechanics.landing_process: 2-step: (1) Skill base chance (varies), (2) ACC vs RES check ((ACC - RES + 200) / 400, capped 0-95%)
proc_mechanics.notes: Poison placement requires both high base chance AND sufficient ACC. See Debuff_Landing.json for landing mechanics.

unm_clan_boss_200m_hp_1_poison.notes: UNM Clan Boss (200M HP) takes 10M damage per turn from 1 strong Poison (5% × 200M). Over 50 turns, theoretical max is 500M damage (assumes 100% uptime, unrealistic).

unm_clan_boss_200m_hp_10_poisons.notes: UNM Clan Boss (200M HP) takes 100M damage per turn from 10 strong Poisons (50% × 200M). Over 50 turns, theoretical max is 5,000M (5 billion) damage. UNREALISTIC: Requires perfect uptime on 10 Poison stacks (never happens in practice).

realistic_poison_team_50_percent_uptime_.notes: REALISTIC Poison team: 6 Poisons average (not 10), 50% uptime (Poisons fall off, RNG landing). Effective damage 30M/turn (60M × 50% uptime). Over 50 turns, 1,500M damage. This is HIGH-END Poison team (requires multiple Poison champions, high ACC, poison sensitivity).

current_team_weak_poison_setup.notes: User's current Poison champions (Frozen Banshee, Elenaril, Narma) are WEAK BUILDS (low ACC, low speed, ungeared). Only maintain ~2 Poisons at 30% uptime. Total Poison damage ~300M over 50 turns. SIGNIFICANTLY WORSE than current team's HP Burn setup (Geomancer 352M HP Burn + Warmaster).

frozen_banshee.passive: Poison Sensitivity (extends Poison duration +1 turn when placed, 75% chance)
frozen_banshee.notes: Frozen Banshee is TOP TIER Poison champion. A1 places 2 Poisons (can proc every turn), A3 places AOE 2 Poisons. Passive extends Poison duration (75% chance +1 turn). With Master Hexer T6 + Poison Sensitivity, Poisons can reach 4-5 turn duration (massive uptime). REQUIRES HIGH ACC (350+) and good gear.

kael.notes: Kael is STARTER champion Poison specialist. A1 places weak Poison (2.5%), A3 places strong Poison AOE (5%). A1 is 0-turn CD (can apply every turn). Good early-game Poison champion, but outclassed late-game (low base chance 75%, only 1 Poison per skill).

outlaw_monk.notes: Outlaw Monk is budget Poison champion. A1 places strong Poison (5%) with 50% base chance. A1 is 0-turn CD (can apply every turn). WEAK: Low base chance (50%), no AOE, no poison extension mechanics.

elenaril.skill_a2: Poison Explosion (detonates Poisons for bonus damage)
elenaril.notes: Elenaril is POISON EXPLOSION specialist. A2 detonates Poisons (removes them, deals bonus damage). NICHE: Only good in Poison teams (needs 8-10 Poisons on boss to maximize explosion damage). WEAK for Clan Boss (removing Poisons loses future Poison ticks, net damage loss unless explosion is massive).

strategy_1_poison_stacking.composition: 3-4 Poison champions (Frozen Banshee, Kael, Outlaw Monk, etc.)
strategy_1_poison_stacking.goal: Maintain 8-10 Poison stacks on boss at all times
strategy_1_poison_stacking.requirements: HIGH ACC (350-390 all champions), speed tune (171-189 SPD), Poison Sensitivity champion (Frozen Banshee)
strategy_1_poison_stacking.notes: Poison stacking teams aim for 10 Poison debuff limit. Requires multiple Poison champions, high ACC, and Poison Sensitivity for extended duration.

strategy_2_poison_explosion.goal: Stack 8-10 Poisons, then detonate with Elenaril A2 for burst damage
strategy_2_poison_explosion.requirements: HIGH ACC (350-390), speed tune (Elenaril slowest for explosion timing), ATK-scaling gear for Elenaril
strategy_2_poison_explosion.expected_damage: Varies (explosion burst ~50M-100M per use, but loses future Poison ticks)
strategy_2_poison_explosion.notes: Poison explosion is NICHE strategy. Good for burst damage (Arena, dungeons), WEAK for sustained damage (Clan Boss). Removing Poisons loses future ticks (net damage loss long-term).

strategy_3_hybrid_poison_and_other_debuf.composition: 1-2 Poison champions + Decrease DEF + HP Burn + support
strategy_3_hybrid_poison_and_other_debuf.goal: Balance Poison damage with other debuffs (Decrease DEF 60% boosts team damage, HP Burn 7.5%/turn)
strategy_3_hybrid_poison_and_other_debuf.requirements: Moderate ACC (350), balanced gear (not all Poison specialists)
strategy_3_hybrid_poison_and_other_debuf.expected_damage: 800M-1,200M Poison + 300M-400M HP Burn + 2.5× team damage from Decrease DEF
strategy_3_hybrid_poison_and_other_debuf.notes: Hybrid teams are BETTER for Clan Boss than pure Poison teams. Decrease DEF 60% boosts ALL damage sources (base skills, Warmaster, Giant Slayer, HP Burn). Pure Poison teams sacrifice team damage multipliers for Poison stacks (net damage loss).

debuff_limit_implications.priority_for_clan_boss: 1. Decrease DEF 60%, 2. Decrease ATK 50%, 3. HP Burn 7.5%, 4. Weaken 25%, 5. Poison 5% (fill remaining slots)
debuff_limit_implications.poison_team_conflict: Poison teams fill all 10 debuff slots with Poisons, pushing out Decrease DEF, HP Burn, etc. This REDUCES team damage (no Decrease DEF multiplier) and survivability (no Decrease ATK).
debuff_limit_implications.recommended_poison_count: 3-5 Poisons (leaves room for Decrease DEF, Decrease ATK, HP Burn, Weaken)
debuff_limit_implications.notes: Poison teams sacrifice debuff slots for Poison stacks. This is NET DAMAGE LOSS for most teams (Decrease DEF 60% boosts team damage ~2.5×, HP Burn 7.5%/turn = 15M/turn, Weaken 25% boosts damage ~1.3×). Poison stacking is ONLY optimal if Poison uptime is >80% AND no better debuff champions available.

clan_boss.damage_potential_solo_poison: 10M per turn (5% × 200M HP UNM CB), 500M over 50 turns at 100% uptime
clan_boss.damage_potential_10_poisons: 100M per turn (50% × 200M HP), 5,000M over 50 turns at 100% uptime (UNREALISTIC)
clan_boss.realistic_damage_hybrid_team: 800M-1,200M Poison + 300M-400M HP Burn + 2.5× team damage from Decrease DEF = HIGHER total damage
clan_boss.notes: Pure Poison teams are WEAKER than hybrid teams for Clan Boss. Decrease DEF 60% boosts ALL damage (base skills, Warmaster, Giant Slayer, HP Burn). Poison stacking sacrifices team damage multipliers for Poison ticks (net loss).

affinity_independence.description: Poison damage is MAX HP percentage, NOT affected by affinity (no weak affinity damage reduction)
affinity_independence.notes: Poison is AFFINITY-SAFE damage. Weak affinity only affects LANDING (glancing hits reduce ACC/RES success), not damage dealt.

defensive_scaling.description: Poison damage ignores target DEF, Increase/Decrease DEF buffs, and Weaken. Fixed percentage damage.
defensive_scaling.notes: Poison is PURE MAX HP damage. No DEF scaling, no ATK scaling. Only MAX HP matters.

vs_hp_burn.poison_advantage: Stacks to 10 (50% MAX HP per turn total)
vs_hp_burn.hp_burn_advantage: +50% damage per debuff (7.5% vs 5%), leaves room for other debuffs
vs_hp_burn.comparison: 1 HP Burn (7.5%/turn) = 1.5 Poisons (7.5% / 5% = 1.5). HP Burn is STRONGER per debuff. For Clan Boss, HP Burn + Decrease DEF + other debuffs is BETTER than 10 Poisons (no Decrease DEF = team damage loss).
vs_hp_burn.notes: HP Burn is BETTER for most Clan Boss teams. Leaves debuff slots for Decrease DEF 60% (team damage ~2.5×), Decrease ATK 50% (survivability), Weaken 25% (damage ~1.3×). Poison stacking is ONLY better if no HP Burn champions available OR Poison uptime >80% AND no Decrease DEF champion.

mistake_1_pure_poison_team.mistake: Building pure Poison team (10 Poison stacks, no Decrease DEF or HP Burn)
mistake_1_pure_poison_team.impact: Loses Decrease DEF 60% team damage multiplier (~2.5×), loses HP Burn 7.5%/turn (15M/turn). Net damage LOWER than hybrid team despite 10 Poison stacks.
mistake_1_pure_poison_team.solution: Use hybrid team: 1 HP Burn (Geomancer), 1 Decrease DEF (Stag Knight), 3-5 Poisons (fill remaining debuff slots). Total damage HIGHER than pure Poison team.

mistake_2_low_acc_poison_champions.mistake: Building Poison champions with low ACC (e.g., 200 ACC)
mistake_2_low_acc_poison_champions.impact: 200 ACC vs 300 RES = 25% land rate. Poison uptime drops from 50% (350 ACC) to 12.5% (200 ACC). Poison damage drops from 1,500M to 375M.
mistake_2_low_acc_poison_champions.solution: Build Poison champions with 350-390 ACC for reliable landing.

mistake_3_ignoring_poison_sensitivity.mistake: Not using Poison Sensitivity champion (Frozen Banshee passive)
mistake_3_ignoring_poison_sensitivity.impact: Poison duration drops from 3-4 turns (with Poison Sensitivity + Master Hexer) to 2 turns (base). Poison uptime drops ~40-50%. Poison damage drops from 1,500M to 900M.
mistake_3_ignoring_poison_sensitivity.solution: Use Frozen Banshee (or similar Poison Sensitivity champion) + Master Hexer T6 for extended Poison duration.

mistake_4_poison_explosion_in_clan_boss.mistake: Using Elenaril A2 (Poison Explosion) in Clan Boss (removes Poisons for burst damage)
mistake_4_poison_explosion_in_clan_boss.impact: Removes 8-10 Poisons (loses future ticks). Explosion damage ~50M-100M, but loses 8-10 Poisons × 10M/turn × 10 turns = 800M-1,000M future damage. NET LOSS.
mistake_4_poison_explosion_in_clan_boss.solution: Do NOT use Poison Explosion in Clan Boss. Save for burst damage content (Arena, dungeons). For Clan Boss, maintain Poison stacks for sustained damage.

mistake_5_confusing_poison_with_hp_burn.mistake: Thinking Poison and HP Burn are equivalent (both MAX HP damage)
mistake_5_confusing_poison_with_hp_burn.impact: Poison is 5%/turn (weaker but stacks), HP Burn is 7.5%/turn (stronger, does NOT stack). Building 10 Poison champions when 1 HP Burn champion is available = damage loss.
mistake_5_confusing_poison_with_hp_burn.solution: Understand HP Burn is STRONGER per debuff (7.5% vs 5%), does NOT stack. Use 1 HP Burn champion, fill rest of debuff slots with Poisons if no better debuffs available.

metadata.validation: Cross-referenced with in-game testing, community calculators, user's weak Poison team setup (Frozen Banshee/Elenaril/Narma), hybrid team comparison
metadata.notes: Comprehensive Poison mechanics for damage attribution modeling and team building. CRITICAL FINDING: Pure Poison teams are WEAKER than hybrid teams (HP Burn + Decrease DEF) for Clan Boss. User's current Poison setup (Frozen Banshee/Elenaril/Narma weak builds) only contributes ~300M damage over 50 turns. Current team's HP Burn setup (Geomancer 352M HP Burn + Warmaster) is SIGNIFICANTLY STRONGER.
